properties.Description: Fusion alert rule base property bag.

alertRuleTemplateName.Description: The Name of the alert rule template used to create this rule.

description.Description: The description of the alert rule.

displayName.Description: The display name for alerts created by this alert rule.

enabled.Description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

lastModifiedUtc.Description: The last time that this alert has been modified.

severity.Description: The severity for alerts created by this alert rule.

tactics.Description: The tactics of the alert rule

displayNamesFilter.Description: the alerts' displayNames on which the cases will be generated

displayNamesExcludeFilter.Description: the alerts' displayNames on which the cases will not be generated

productFilter.Description: The alerts' productName on which the cases will be generated.

severitiesFilter.Description: the alerts' severities on which the cases will be generated

alertRuleTemplateName.Description: The Name of the alert rule template used to create this rule.

description.Description: The description of the alert rule.

displayName.Description: The display name for alerts created by this alert rule.

enabled.Description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

lastModifiedUtc.Description: The last time that this alert has been modified.

properties.Description: Scheduled alert rule base property bag.

query.Description: The query that creates alerts for this rule.

queryFrequency.Description: The frequency (in ISO 8601 duration format) for this alert rule to run.

queryPeriod.Description: The period (in ISO 8601 duration format) that this alert rule looks at.

severity.Description: The severity for alerts created by this alert rule.

triggerOperator.Description: The operation against the threshold that triggers alert rule.

triggerThreshold.Description: The threshold triggers this alert rule.

alertRuleTemplateName.Description: The Name of the alert rule template used to create this rule.

description.Description: The description of the alert rule.

displayName.Description: The display name for alerts created by this alert rule.

enabled.Description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

lastModifiedUtc.Description: The last time that this alert rule has been modified.

suppressionDuration.Description: The suppression (in ISO 8601 duration format) to wait since last time this alert rule been triggered.

suppressionEnabled.Description: Determines whether the suppression for this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

tactics.Description: The tactics of the alert rule

triggerUri.Description: Logic App Callback URL for this specific workflow.

workflowId.Description: The name of the logic app's workflow.

created.Description: The time the bookmark was created

createdBy.Description: User information that made some action

displayName.Description: The display name of the bookmark

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this bookmark

queryResult.Description: The query result of the bookmark.

updated.Description: The last time the bookmark was updated

updatedBy.Description: User information that made some action

queryStartTime.Description: The start time for the query

queryEndTime.Description: The end time for the query

incidentInfo.Description: Describes related incident information for the bookmark

objectId.Description: The object id of the user.

classification.Description: The reason the incident was closed.

classificationComment.Description: Describes the reason the incident was closed

classificationReason.Description: The classification reason the incident was closed with.

createdTimeUtc.Description: The time the incident was created

firstActivityTimeUtc.Description: The time of the first activity in the incident

incidentUrl.Description: The deep-link url to the incident in Azure portal

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this incident

lastActivityTimeUtc.Description: The time of the last activity in the incident

lastModifiedTimeUtc.Description: The last time the incident was updated

owner.Description: Information on the user an incident is assigned to

relatedAnalyticRuleIds.Description: List of resource ids of Analytic rules related to the incident

alertsCount.Description: The number of alerts in the incident

bookmarksCount.Description: The number of bookmarks in the incident

commentsCount.Description: The number of comments in the incident

alertProductNames.Description: List of product names of alerts in the incident

email.Description: The email of the user the incident is assigned to.

assignedTo.Description: The name of the user the incident is assigned to.

objectId.Description: The object id of the user the incident is assigned to.

userPrincipalName.Description: The user principal name of the user the incident is assigned to.

author.Description: Information on the client (user or application) that made some action

objectId.Description: The object id of the client.
